    • Uses of Account in com.stormpath.sdk.account

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account that return Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account PasswordResetToken.getAccount() 
      Account CreateAccountRequest.getAccount()
      Returns the Account instance for which a new record will be created in Stormpath.
      Account Account.removeGroup(Group group)
      Removes this account from the specified Group.
      Account Account.removeGroup(String hrefOrName)
      Removes this account from the specified Group represented by its (case insensitive) name or href .
      Account Account.saveWithResponseOptions(AccountOptions responseOptions)
      Saves this Account resource and ensures the returned Account response reflects the specified options.
      Account Account.setEmail(String email)
      Sets the account's email address, which must be unique among all other accounts within a Directory.
      Account Account.setGivenName(String givenName)
      Sets the account's given name (aka 'first name' in Western cultures').
      Account Account.setMiddleName(String middleName)
      Sets the account's middle name(s).
      Account Account.setPassword(String password)
      Sets (changes) the account's password to the specified raw (plaintext) password.
      Account Account.setStatus(AccountStatus status)
      Sets the account's status.
      Account Account.setSurname(String surname)
      Sets the account's surname (aka 'last name' in Western cultures).
      Account Account.setUsername(String username)
      Sets the account's username, which must be unique among all other accounts within a Directory.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account with parameters of type Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CreateAccountRequestBuilder Accounts.newCreateRequestFor(Account account)
      Creates a new CreateAccountRequestBuilder instance reflecting the specified Account instance.

    • Uses of Account in com.stormpath.sdk.application

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application that return Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account Application.createAccount(Account account)
      Creates a new Account that may login to this application.
      Account Application.createAccount(CreateAccountRequest request)
      Creates a new Account that may login to this application according to the request criteria.
      Account Application.resetPassword(String passwordResetToken, String newPassword)
      Verifies the password reset token (received in the user's email) and immediately changes the password in the same request (if the token is valid).
      Account Application.verifyPasswordResetToken(String token)
      Verifies a password reset token in a user-clicked link within an email.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application with parameters of type Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account Application.createAccount(Account account)
      Creates a new Account that may login to this application.

    • Uses of Account in com.stormpath.sdk.directory

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.directory that return Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account Directory.createAccount(Account account)
      Creates a new account instance in the directory using the Directory's default registration workflow setting.
      Account Directory.createAccount(Account account, boolean registrationWorkflowEnabled)
      Creates a new account instance in the directory with an explicit registration workflow directive.
      Account Directory.createAccount(CreateAccountRequest request)
      Creates a new account instance in the directory with options to override the registration workflow directive and retrieve account's references in the creation response.

      Account AccountResolver.getAccount(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
      Returns the current user account associated with the specified request or null if no user account is associated with the request.
      Account DefaultAccountResolver.getRequiredAccount(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request) 
      Account AccountResolver.getRequiredAccount(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
      Returns the current user account identity associated with the request or throws an IllegalArgumentException exception if there is no account associated with the request.
